[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [Options](./blockly.options_class.md)

## Options class

Parse the user-specified options, using reasonable defaults where behaviour is unspecified.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Options 
```

(p1: { x?: number; y?: number; }) =&gt; void

_(Optional)_ If set, sets the translation of the workspace to match the scrollbars. A function that sets the translation of the workspace to match the scrollbars. The argument Contains an x and/or y property which is a float between 0 and 1 specifying the degree of scrolling.
